import React, { useState } from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const FormInput = (props) => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ id:new Date(), user_title:"Mr", user_firstname: null, user_lastname: null, user_birthday:null, user_nationality:null, user_citizenID:null, user_gender:"Male", user_phoneType:"+66", user_mobliephone:null, user_passportNo:null, user_salary:null, }); const dispatch = useDispatch({}); const onChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target.name); var phoneType = "+66"; if(e.target.name == "user_mobliephoneType"){ phoneType = e.target.value; } setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(user); props.dispatch({ type:'ADD_DATA', user }) } return(

-

); } export default connect()(FormInput);
